Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets changing to flurries at times heavy this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
